title: The Perimeter
description: The Perimeter is a darkly captivating dystopian tale of adventure, danger, love and redemption that will have you on the edge of your seat and up at night turning the pages to find out what happens in the end.In this fractured world, a sinister force is coming for Riley, and the only things keeping her safe are a perimeter fence and the people she loves. As her life is threatened, she must make impossible choices. But help comes from the most unlikely of places, and all Riley needs to know is: who can she really trust?Meanwhile, a repentant killer searches for peace and salvation, but what he gets is the exact opposite. Now heâ€™ll have to make the hardest decision of his life.
author: Shalini Boland
